thread.title: Breathtaking video shows beauty of Iceland by moonlight | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Breathtaking video shows beauty of Iceland by moonlight | Daily Mail Online

author: Naomi Leach For Mailonline
title: Breathtaking video shows beauty of Iceland by moonlight | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Iceland’s steely natural beauty magnetises travellers to its mountains, waterfalls and vibrant capital. But now a spell-binding video of the country shot under a full moon, is sure to inspire even more holidaymakers to book a ticket to the picturesque wonderland. Icelandic photographer Ozzo Photography has captured the serenity of the coastline while kayaking and surfing at night. Gushing icy waterfalls, the steamy lagoons and snow covered glaciers also make an appearance in the stunning drone footage. Packing all of the country’s highlights into just three minutes of film, empty winter roads and the bright lights of Reykjavik also feature. Complementing the dreamy video is the eerie green of the Northern Lights, staining the night sky. Icelandic photographer Ozzo Photography has captured the serenity of Iceland's coastline while kayaking and surfing at night Packing all of the country’s highlights into just three minutes of film, empty winter roads and the bright lights of Reykjavik (above) feature RELATED ARTICLES
